episode: I was annoyed when I learned that a friend volunteered me to help them move.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was annoyed when a friend recently volunteered me to help them move.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's frustrating. Did you end up helping them?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, I did because I felt that friends should help each other, but I wasn't really happy.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You felt obligated, but still resentful.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, I felt they should of asked first, and also they are the kind of person that has lied in the past to get out of help me and others

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: So there's trust issues too.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, big trust issues with this person

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Makes it harder to help when you feel taken advantage of.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I agree, that is how I felt the whole time I was helping them. They are just taking advantage of my goodwill.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Sounds like they're exploiting your kindness.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I feel that they are. When it comes time for me to ask them for help in return they will have an excuse or not help

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're expecting them to flake on you again.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, everyone in our group of friends knows they do not show up or help when they are expected too.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Guess that's why you're annoyed, not just about this one incident.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That's definitely played into my issues with them, this is just a recent one that has annoyed me

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: A fresh example of their usual behavior.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: What would be a good way to address their behavior going forward?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Setting clear boundaries and expectations might help.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Good idea. I feel that the next time they ask for help I will tell them how and why I feel that way

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Being honest and direct might help them understand your perspective.
